thread.title: China’s Giant Money-Market Fund Sharply Lowers Daily Withdrawal Limits

author: Stella Yifan Xie
title: China’s Giant Money-Market Fund Sharply Lowers Daily Withdrawal Limits

organizations.name: lowers daily withdrawal limits billionaire jack ma’s ant financial services group

text:
Billionaire Jack Ma’s Ant Financial Services Group will sharply reduce how much cash investors in the world’s largest money-market fund can withdraw daily from Ant’s popular payments network, a move that could help limit the risk of a potential liquidity crunch.
An asset-management division of Ant Financial operates Yu’e Bao, an online platform that in just four years created the world’s largest money-market fund by drawing idle cash from hundreds of millions of users of Alipay, a mobile payments network owned by Ant.
